titleStmt.title: Sermons preached at Pauls Crosse and else-where, by Iohn Hoskins, sometimes fellow of New-Colledge in Oxford, minister and Doctor of Law
titleStmt.author: Hoskins, John, 1579-1631.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by William Stansby for Nathaniel Butter, and are to be sold at his shop at Saint Austens gate,

notesStmt.note: "Tvvo sermons preached at Oxford", "Tvvo sermons preached: the one at Hereford, the other at Pauls Crosse", "Tvvo sermons preached: the one at Saint Maries in Oxford, the other being the conclusion of the rehearsall sermon at Pauls Crosse. 1614" each have separate dated title page, pagination and register.
The first leaf and the last leaf are blank.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: his shop at Saint Austens gate
